pages.text: 67|1|Purʙarakatu ʙuzurgvor ast kase, ki farmonravoii cahoni hasti ʙa dasti Ust va U ʙar har ciz tavonost
67|2|[Hamon] Kase, ki margu zindagiro ofarid, to sumoro ʙiozmojad, ki kadom jake az sumo nakukortar ast; va U piruzmandu ʙaxsanda ast
67|3|On ki haft osmonro ʙar farozi jakdigar ofarid. Dar ofarinis [-i Alloh taolo] hec ʙenazmi va xalale nameʙini. Bori digar nigoh kun; ojo nuqse meʙini
67|4|Bori digar [ʙa olami hasti] nigoh kun; [nuqse naxohi did va] casmi tu, dar hole ki xasta va notavon ast ʙa suji tu ʙozmegardad
67|5|Ba rosti, Mo osmoni dunjoro ʙo caroƣho orostem va onhoro ʙaroi rondani sajotin qaror dodem va ʙaroi onon azoʙi [otasi] suzon omoda soxtem
67|6|Va ʙaroi kasone, ki ʙa Parvardigorason kofir sudand, azoʙi cahannam ast; va ci ʙad cojgohe ast
67|7|Hangome ki dar on andoxta savand, az on na'rae [vahsatnok] mesunavand, dar hole ki on mecusad
67|8|Az siddati xasm nazdik ast [cahannam] pora-pora savad. Har goh ki guruhe dar on andoxta mesavand, nigahʙononas az onon mepursand: «Ojo ʙimdihandae ʙa suroƣaton naomad?»
67|9|Megujand: «Bale; ʙimdihanda ʙa sui mo omad, on goh mo uro takziʙ kardem va guftem; «Hargiz Alloh taolo cize nozil nakardaast. Sumo cuz dar gumrohii ʙuzurg nested»
67|10|Va [ʙoz] megujand: «Agar mo mesunidem jo taaqqul mekardem, dar [zumrai] duzaxijon naʙudem»
67|11|Pas, onho ʙa gunohi xud e'tirof mekunand. Pas, duri [az rahmati Alloh taolo] ʙahrai duzaxijon ʙod
67|12|Be gumon, kasone, ki dar nihon az Parvardigorason metarsand, onon omurzisu podosi ʙuzurge dorand
